subject: Re: [R] how to extract the maximum from a matrix?
body:
look at the `arr.ind' argument of ?which(), e.g.,

x <- matrix(rnorm(9), 3, 3)
x
which(x == max(x), arr.ind = TRUE)


I hope it helps.

Best,
Dimitris
